transcript:
But mind you come to dinner or I shall be offended, ma chtre! On behalf of the whole family I beg you to come, mon cher!" These words he repeated to everyone without exception or variation, and with the same ex- pression on his full, cheerful, clean-shaven face, the same firm pressure of the hand and the same quick, repeated bows. As soon as he had seen a visitor off he returned to one of those who were still in the drawing room,
